'''Shattered Night Jade''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from several different [[World Quest|World Quests]].

Collecting all three Shattered Night Jades will cause them to automatically combine into {{Item|Night Jade}}, and will grant the {{Achievement|Offering to Nothingness}}. The combined Night Jade can be used to access the [[Chamber of Night's Trial]].

==Locations==
* Open the Precious Chest after completing {{Quest|Revelations from the Past}}
* Complete {{Quest|To the Night, What is the Night's}}
* Open the Luxurious Chest after completing the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Trail of Subjugated Saurians]]"
